item.title: 6 Amazing Benefits of Green Coffee Beans
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Green coffee beans have been increasingly popular as a weight-loss product in recent years. Green coffee beans contain chlorogenic acid, which is anti-obesity, anti-diabetic, anti-inflammatory, and anticarcinogenic. This substance improves your focus, elevates your mood, and regulates your blood pressure.
